messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] unschoolers' groups
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/6/2003 12:33:08 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... And that s how SOS started (and the conference). I just thought we needed an unschoolers
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/6/2003 12:33:08 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> I've been tossing around starting an unschooler group here but I'm kinda
> apprehensive. Any sugestions? I'm really not into debate or arguing. So many
> people think unschooling is eclectic. I know it may be a step to it
> but...Plus I just don't want to start it alone. Maybe after the conference
> I'll be braver and more committed to community.
>

And that's how SOS started (and the conference). I just thought we needed an
unschoolers' group. If you start one, they will come---in droves!

And you started posting here after last year's conference. Happy to set you
up again, Barb! <G>

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
